overview: Craig Jones, executive vice president, worldwide field operations, joins Mincom from Oracle where he ran applications sales as vice president for the Asia Pacific region. Craig was responsible for more than thirteen different industries across the region, including discrete and process manufacturing, transportation, natural resources, engineering, and construction. In recent years he led the integration of PeopleSoft, JDE, Siebel, and a number of niche application vendors. Craig has more than 10 yearsâ€™ management experience in the global software industry.
